segments.text: This whole scene is a ticking time bomb, isn't it?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is spreading, creating a significant hazard on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the woman's shoe already soaking, yet she doesn't stir.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's only a matter of time before someone slips and falls.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And then there are those children, barely clinging to that unstable stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy could easily lose his balance and tumble down.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Broken dishes, bruises, maybe even a serious injury.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: All this happening while the adult is completely lost in thought.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The calm exterior of the window view just makes it all feel more unsettling.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It truly is a precarious moment, full of hidden dangers.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just want everything to be okay for them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This situation is so close to turning into a disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR
